price: ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ ߞߍߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߞߏ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߛߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߦߌ߬ߘߊ߬ ߟߴߌ ߟߊ߫ ߝߊ߯ߛߌ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
